name: Re Wind
description:
Re-Wind is my Brackey's 2020.2 Jam game, hopes it's fun

Its basically a rage game (but not too hard)

You control a metal sphere that redirect the wind and rewinding time
Your sphere is also causing alot of distruction when going in diffirent mark of times

And thats all, there are alot more but i would consider it spoiler so download and see what you may find!

Rate my game! https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-4/rate/723136
